obata antharjalaya thulin mudal ipayime siyaluma siddhantha(krama ) aawaranaya kere.patamalawa awasanaye obata,1.sampurna web adawiyak sadime hakiyawa2.paya kipayakin mudal sewime hakiyawa.3.antharjala wyapruthi sarthakawa sidukara mudal sewime hakiyawa4.obata awashya oonama deyak alewikirimata hakiyawaathulu boho de labenu atha.sa.yu: mema patamalawa obage niwasatama pamina sidu karana athara,palamudina nomile uganwanu labe.oba patamalawa kere dakwana adahas edina prakasha kala haka.**dinayan sakachcha karagatha haka.patamala kalaya masa 3ki**

edina, enam sapthambar masa 10 wana dina shri lanka padanam aayathanayedi "lama aarakshana balakaya" bala mulu ganwime uthsawa sabhawa amathu hitapu janadhipathini chandrika bandaranayaka kumarathunga mathiniya kiya gatha yuthu wuna de apatath wada hondin uthsawa sabhawa amatha pawasu athara, (pahatha widiyowa narambaanna) ema shalawe, lama aarakshana adhikariya wenuwen wen kala thibunu “his putu” ee ahawal adhikariye swabhawaya honda hati pawasu bawa apata pasak wiya.

oyata one nam galawanna kiyala mama akkage nayitiya galawala than deka uranna gaththa thandeka unana kota akka mage paka allan mirikanawa paka aran akkage athata dunna meya paka mirika mirika patta aathal ekak denawa akka eka paratama paka aragena kate dagaththa akkage jangiya galawala mama diwa danna gaththa akkage jus amuthuma rahak enne mata ee raha kiyanna therenne na mama kimbata diwa danakota akka thandeka mirika kanagaman kagahanawa ane raththaran mata inna ba dannam hukanna ko kiya kiya akka ka gahanawa.

yahapalana hawul aanduwe prabala amathiwarayaku siya upandina sadaya samarima sandaha thama amathyanshayata ayath sansthawakin rupiyal laksha 80 k wayakara athi bawa heliwanne yayi dushana wirodhi handa sanwidhanaye kandawumkaru wasantha samarasinha mahatha pawasayi.mema mudala waya karanu labu sansthawe sabhapathiwaraya amathiwarayage samipathamayaku bawa pawasena athara siya niwase sewaya kirima sandaha ema sansthawe sewakayin yoda ganimatada amathiwaraya katayuthu kara athayi pawasena athara sansthawe sabhapathiwarayata wiruddhawa ehi sewakayin masa kihipayaka sita dawantha wirodhathawayak ella karamin sitina bawath dushana wirodhi handa sanwidhanaye kandawumkaru wadiduratath pawasayi.
ee karanakotagena winishwaya dawasedi ape ee pasugiya kriyawan nawatha widiyo patiyen rupa gathakara penwima walakinneya.

samahara jiwitha pawenawa witharayi.
